attributes.action: scrap MP's allowances for second homes and develop a "halls of residence" for MP's instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's need accommodation in central London, but they do not need expensive second homes.  A single halls of residence, close to the Houses of Parliament, would be far more cost effective and transparent.  We the undersigned call upon the Prime Minister to consider this proposal as part of a debate on MP's expenses.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
